CustomField.description: This will be true if the new bank details differ from the ones held on the Person Account. But only if we actually hold bank details. If we don't have any details this will always show as false, but have just received them, this will show as false.
CustomField.formula:
AND(
NOT( AND( ISBLANK(Person_Account__r.Bank_Account_Name__c), ISBLANK(Person_Account__r.Bank_Account_Number__c), ISBLANK(Person_Account__r.Bank_Name__c), ISBLANK(Person_Account__r.Bank_sort_code__c) ) ) , OR( NOT(Bank_Account_Name__c = Person_Account__r.Bank_Account_Name__c), NOT(Bank_Account_Number__c = Person_Account__r.Bank_Account_Number__c), NOT(Bank_Name__c = Person_Account__r.Bank_Name__c), NOT( Bank_Sort_Code__c = Person_Account__r.Bank_sort_code__c) ) )
CustomField.label: Different bank details
